headers.content-security-policy: connect-src 'self' https://*.algolia.net https://*.algolianet.com https://fonts.googleapis.com https://fonts.gstatic.com; default-src 'none'; font-src https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https://i.ytimg.com; manifest-src 'self'; prefetch-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://storage.googleapis.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; worker-src 'self'
